column4: I need help getting Grub fixed for Ubuntu 11.04. I'm dual booting with Windows 7 and I think Grub got hosed after a Windows update. I don't even get to the Grub menu, the computer just boots straight into Windows. I'm currently running off of the Ubuntu LiveCD.
Thanks, nifty looking little tool. Let's see if it works.
sounds like you got the sp1 in windows, the reload of the mbr should work just read caerefully.
